web_snippets: Ben Aitken was born under Thatcher, grew to 6ft then stopped, and is an Aquarius. He was conceived by a nurse and a shipwright, grew up in Portsmouth.
Ben Aitken stops by Travel Writing World to answer a few questions about his life and career as an author and a travel writer.
